import { useState } from "react"; import backgroundImage from "../../resources/backgrounds/background_4.jpg"; import "./Donate.css"; import { Button } from "primereact/button"; import { InputNumber } from "primereact/inputnumber"; import React from "react"; export default function Donate() { const [donateAmountPrzelewy24, setDonateAmountPrzelewy24] = useState(10); const [donateAmountPSC, setDonateAmountPSC] = useState(10); const [donateAmountPaypal, setDonateAmountPaypal] = useState(10); const client_id = 26606; return (
